thread.title: Chili’s Bar & Grill: 3-Course Meal Only $10 (Includes Appetizer, Entree and Dessert)
thread.title_full: Chili’s Bar & Grill: 3-Course Meal Only $10 (Includes Appetizer, Entree and Dessert)

author: Kimberly (Stylish Sidekick)
title: Chili’s Bar & Grill: 3-Course Meal Only $10 (Includes Appetizer, Entree and Dessert)

organizations.name: house salad or chips & salsa entree

text:
Need a break from cooking? For a limited time, Chili’s Grill & Bar is offering a 3-course meal for only $10 ! Your meal will include an appetizer, entree and dessert. Head here for more details.
Here are the options you can choose from: Appetizer → Choose either a Fresco Salad, House Salad or Chips & Salsa Entree → Choose from a Burger (4 Varieties), Fajitas, Smoked Bone-in BBQ Chicken Breast or Baby Back 1/2 Rack Dessert → Choose a Mini Chocolate Molten (Thanks, Couponing 2 Savings !)
